items.summary: Create a Terms and Conditions page at route /terms with comprehensive placeholder template text covering standard marketplace terms including user responsibilities, intellectual property rights, payment terms, dispute resolution, and liability disclaimers in a static scrollable format

Create a Privacy Policy page at route /privacy-policy with comprehensive placeholder template text covering data collection practices, user information usage, cookie policies, third-party services, data security, and user rights in a static scrollable format

Update the Layout component in frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx to include footer links to the Terms and Conditions (/terms) and Privacy Policy (/privacy-policy) pages, ensuring the footer is visible on all pages

Add required acceptance checkboxes for Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy to the ProfileSetupModal component in frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModal.tsx, preventing profile creation until both checkboxes are checked

Add required acceptance checkboxes for Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy to the ArtistRegistration page in frontend/src/pages/ArtistRegistration.tsx, preventing artist registration until both checkboxes are checked
Add termsAccepted and privacyPolicyAccepted boolean fields to the UserProfile data model in backend/main.mo to store user acceptance status of legal documents

Implement backend validation in the createUserProfile and registerAsArtist functions in backend/main.mo to reject profile creation if termsAccepted or privacyPolicyAccepted are false, returning an appropriate error message
